input.sentences: the new theme park was beginning to take shape .
the fun fair was going to be closed for a while .
their dino world will draw the younger visitors .
output.sentences: Searching for the man who stole my bike. I was tipped off that he ran passed those bushes out front.
I walked passed this roller coaster, and into a theme park.
The sign clearly stated that I shouldn't enter! But the man who stole my bike was in there.
So I hopped the fence and explored the park. I saw amazing roller coasters.
Finally at the kids park, I spotted dinosaur. He was the culprit!
